name: Paramount Group, Inc.
description: Paramount Group, Inc. is a leading real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses on owning, operating, and managing high-quality office properties in prime urban markets in the United States. Founded in 2014 and headquartered in New York City, Paramount specializes in properties located in the key metropolitan areas of New York, San Francisco, and Washington, D.C. The company is committed to providing exceptional workspaces that enhance the productivity of its tenants while also contributing to the vibrancy of the communities it serves. Paramount Group's portfolio consists of iconic, well-located office buildings that feature modern amenities and sustainable design practices. The firm places a strong emphasis on sustainability and environmental stewardship, implementing innovative strategies to reduce energy consumption and improve operational efficiencies. With a diverse tenant base that includes major corporations and government agencies, Paramount Group is well-positioned to capitalize on the evolving demands of the commercial real estate market. The company's strategic focus on high-quality assets and its commitment to responsive property management have established it as a trusted partner in the real estate sector.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA

seo.meta_title: Paramount Group, Inc. | Premier Office REIT
seo.meta_description: Explore Paramount Group, Inc., a leading office REIT focused on high-quality properties in prime urban markets. Learn about our commitment to sustainability and tenant satisfaction.

faq.question: What type of properties does Paramount Group own?
faq.answer: Paramount Group primarily owns and operates high-quality office properties in major urban markets.

faq.question: Where is Paramount Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Paramount Group is headquartered in New York City, New York, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Paramount Group?
faq.answer: The CEO of Paramount Group is Albert Behler.
